detail_desc: Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

Off-the-shoulder blouse woven in a cotton blend with broderie anglaise. Narrow elastication and a frill trim at the top, long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length, washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Shorts in a viscose and linen weave with wide smocking at the waist and side pockets.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Blouse in a fine cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and visible buttons at the top. Smocking with gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Monkstraps in shiny imitation leather with a metal buckle. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Heel 4 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round neckline and long dolman sleeves.
Sleeveless top in satin with a V-neck front and back and lace section at the top of the front.
Knee-length dress in a crinkled weave with narrow shoulder straps and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in nepped cotton poplin with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in slub cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short blouse in airy seersucker made from a viscose blend with a lace section at the front. Frill-trimmed neckline and a V-shaped opening with ties at the top. Long sleeves with a flounced trim at the shoulders and elastication at the cuffs.
Metal hair clips. Length 4 cm.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.

Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned T-shirt with narrow ribbing around the neckline and a press stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Studio Collection. Large shopper in patterned, organic cotton canvas with two handles at the top. Can be carried over the shoulders. Size 40x55 cm.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, classic front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Oversized shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, two pairs with resin pendants. Length from approx. 2.7 cm to 5.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed finish.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs with two pendants. Adjustable length 31-39 cm.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, decorative tab and button on one shoulder and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar with an opening and button at the front, pin-tucks at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Straight-style top in a soft, fine knit with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and short, flounced sleeves.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a decorative grosgrain bow at the waist, and side pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and roll edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Short sleeves and short legs, both with sewn-in turn-ups, and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and full feet.
Leggings in jersey made from a soft, organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One patterned pair and one pair in a solid colour.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with notch lapels and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Metal rings in various designs.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

Shorts in washed cotton canvas with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and decorative seams on the legs.

Blouse in an airy, printed weave with a round neck with a V-neck opening and ties at the front and long raglan sleeves with a flounce down the sides. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in patterned chiffon crêpe with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Short crêpe weave shorts in a relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a unique nursing feature, designed in a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Bottoms with an elasticated, V-shaped, wrapover waistband below the tummy for added comfort.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Strapless bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and side support.

Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with embroidered details. V-neck at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline, a small frilled collar and twisted ties at the top. Visible seam front and back, and short raglan sleeves with smocking and a frill trim. Unlined.

Lightweight puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood and discreet zip down the front with a chin guard. Pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a slightly lower neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Classic T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Pool shoes in rubber and satin with moulded rubber soles that are grained underneath.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem. Rib-knit turtleneck, a zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif on the front.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
A-line dress in soft jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with raw edges and fringing on the short sides. Size approx. 110x200 cm.
Jacket with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with an adjustable tab and press-studs. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide, foldover waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops and a small lace trim.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length leather trousers with contrasting colour seams, a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a jetted back pocket with a button, and straight legs with seams at the knees.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, and straight, wide legs.
Boxy-style shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Blouse in woven fabric with short balloon sleeves and an opening at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps and fasteners at the top. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a gathered seam at the hips and flared skirt. Top with flutter sleeves and a slightly longer, rounded back. Shorts in sturdy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist. 3/4-length leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Sandals with a wraparound ankle strap with an adjustable fastener, and covered block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with a wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder and a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap over the other shoulder. Matching bikini bottoms.
